document.full_text: copier and printer maker ricoh co will cut nearly 10 percent of its staff to try to boost profits, a move that shows underperforming japanese companies are stepping up efforts to compete with global rivals.
document.title: japan's ricoh to axe 10,000 jobs, promises to get back in shape
lines_and_colors: copier and printer maker ricoh co will cut nearly 10 percent of its staff to try to boost profits, a move that shows underperforming japanese companies are stepping up efforts to compete with global rivals.
